faultwithdip class¶

class csi.faultwithdip(name, utmzone=None, ellps='WGS84', lon0=None, lat0=None, verbose=False)¶
buildPatches(dip, dipdirection, every=10, trace_tol=0.1, trace_fracstep=0.2, trace_xaxis='x')¶

Builds a dipping fault. Args:

  • dip : Dip angle
  • dipdirection : Direction towards which the fault dips.
